organization.address: Charles Welty, Editor, Davidson Press, 14700 Firestone Blvd., Suite 122, La Mirada, CA 90638-2925

translations.name: International Standard Version
translations.description: The International Standard Version or ISV is an English translation of the Bible released in 1998. The translation attempts to strike a balance between a literal translation and an idiomatic translation, a philosophy the ISV translators call \\\"literal-idiomatic.\\\"
